data.title: Faculty Honors & Awards
data.text:
Our outstanding faculty have earned many prestigious awards and accolades. Some of the highlights are listed below.

Nobel Prizes

National Medal of Science

Academy Memberships and Fellowships

UCI Campus Awards

Physics & Astronomy Department Awards

American Physical Society Fellows

UCI Academic Senate Award Recipients [all]

Complete List [Alphabetical]

The 1995 Nobel Prizes:

The UCI School of Physical Sciences gained international prominence in 1995 when professors F. Sherwood Rowland (Chemistry) and Frederick Reines (Physics) each received Nobel Prizes, making UC Irvine the first public university with faculty honored in two different fields in the same year.

National Medal of Science:

The National Medal of Science was awarded to Frederick Reines in 1983.
